::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus: So which way to this base of yours?

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Perceptor:
 
 "what did you expected that she would said? as good maximal sher wont 
 betray a legend as Rodimus Prime and as so such in love, she would 
 die first for him... Now would be hard to find her, she usually wont 
 leave the base... and she wont do it after she met my best job: 
 BlackStorm"
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Lord Jhiaxus::
 > 
 > Jhiaxus slams one fist into his other open hand.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus: Damn! I had a Maximal femme bot cornered not too long ago. 
 When her friends arrived to aid her I'm sure they called her 
 Nightlight. She told me she knew nothing of Rodimus Prime other then 
 him being around. Lieing slag!
 > 
 > xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> 
 wrote:                                  Perceptor:
 >  
 >  "I just know about the girl, her name is Nightlight, I guess that
